Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder and neck section of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of six lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393425) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393425)
